article_title: A New Queen of Independent Film
article_text:
The king of the Oscars was dethroned this year, at least temporarily, by a queen less than half his age.

With 17 nominations for "American Hustle," "Her" and "The Grandmaster," producer Megan Ellison's Annapurna Pictures easily surpassed the 11 earned by Harvey Weinstein's Weinstein Co. this year for films including "Philomena," "August: Osage County," and "Mandela: Long Walk to...

twitter.description: With 17 Oscar nominations, Megan Ellison's Annapurna Pictures is now vying with the Weinsteins for indie royalty
twitter.title: A New Queen of Independent Film
